#Getting started with modifying Console Player

= Introduction =

Console Player is programmed with Python 2.7 (32 bit) and PyQt version 4.8.5. VLC is not required for playback, when not installed The application will fall back to a default media player installed on you system.



= Required Files =
  * [http://www.python.org/getit/releases/2.7/ Python 2.7 32bit]
  * [http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/software/pyqt/intro PyQt]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/mutagen/ Mutagen] - Audio Tagging library 

== Windows ==
  * [http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/pyhook/index.php?title=Main_Page pyHook] - for media keys

== Linux ==
  * So far there are no linux specific files

== Additional ==
  * [http://www.videolan.org/ VLC] - The latest version will playback prevent issues
